title: Beside you
lyrics: tone It's just you and I, and no other guys We got no interruptions and we both feelin' the vibe Say I'm not your type But I know what's on your mind We can talk about nothin' or we can see what it's like Don't lie, baby don't lie His love never felt right Switch sides and I'm beside you If you say it's alright * (rải nhẹ) Way too many heads, need a steady view Smokin' cigarettes at the rendezvous Never meant to cross you But my jaw hit the floor with the one , two Think I want you You say this ain't love but it's still the same love Make love, anything to sate ya Don't be shy, you decide Say can I, make you mine? Don't lie, baby don't lie His love never felt right Switch sides and I'm beside ya If you say it's alright * (rải nhẹ) Don't lie, baby don't lie His love never felt right Switch sides and I'm beside ya If you say it's alright hmmm Your skin, so fine Come close baby put it on mine Your skin, so fine Come close baby put it on mine Huooooo Don't lie, baby don't lie His love never felt right Switch sides and I'm beside ya If you say it's alright hmmmm
